attributes.action: Stop Nigel Farage speaking on behalf of the British Public at all events.
attributes.additional_details: This man is going to do irreparable damage to Britain's relationships with other countries and potentially damage any chance we have of negotiating anything of value to us.
attributes.background: After his rude and divisive speech to the European Parliament on the 28th June, where he spoke on behalf of Britain, it is in Britain's best interest if Nigel Farage is not allowed to represent Britain again.
